---
desc: Direct names
---


Start of string
.
:smile: test __1__
.
<p>ğŸ˜€ test <strong>1</strong></p>
.


End of string
.
test __2__ :happy:
.
<p>test <strong>2</strong> ğŸ˜†</p>
.


Middle & multiple
.
aaa :joy: bbb :proud: ccc :kissing_heart: ddd
.
<p>aaa ğŸ˜‚ bbb ğŸ˜Š ccc ğŸ˜˜ ddd</p>
.


Unknown name
.
:joy: :qwerty:
.
<p>ğŸ˜‚ :qwerty:</p>
.
